title: Pearl iZUMi Men's Select Triathlon Singlet
description: The relaxed fit of the Pearl Izumi Men's Select Singlet offers speed and comfort for those new to triathlons with a bit more coverage. Select Sensor-Transfer fabric keeps moisture at bay Select Direct-Vent integrated mesh panels for fast drying, optimum temperature regulation Flatlock seams for a chafe-free fit Newly designed back pocket gives a place to securely stash nutrition 10" zip for venting Fabric: Main: 100% micro polyester, Mesh: 100% polyester

Sleeveless for warm-weather training and racing, the Pearl Izumi Men's Select Sleeveless Triathlon Singlet offers a semi-form fit for those new to triathlons or those looking for a bit more coverage. Its Select Sensor-Transfer fabric keeps moisture at bay while its Select Transfer Direct-Vent integrated mesh panels and a 3/4 zip opening provide for fast drying, optimum temperature regulation. Other features include flatlock seams for a chafe-free fit, and a newly designed back pocket for a place to securely stash nutrition. Backed by a limited lifetime warranty, this jersey is not recommended for use in chlorinated pools.

More than 50 years ago in Tokyo, a father produced Japan's first bicycle racing apparel for his son, a promising racer. He named his soon-to-be-established company Pearl Izumi, derived from the gem "pearl" and an area of Japan known for its clear water ("Izumi"). Literally translated, the name means "fountain of pearls." Distributed in the U.S. since 1981, Pearl Izumi USA sponsored the U.S. national team in 1984 and several major trade teams during the mid-'80s, helping the company earn an almost cult-like following among cyclists. The Pearl Izumi USA line is dedicated to meeting the needs of the serious sport enthusiast, including not just cyclists but cross-country skiers, triathletes, duathletes, runners, and more.
